Dr. Sumanto Bagchi is incredibly skilled and professional in his work. He is very knowledgeable about dental health and procedures and took the time to explain everything clearly to us. We [my wife and myself] felt very comfortable and at ease during  our second visit in these many years, as the  Dr. Sumanto Bagchi was kind, patient, and attentive to our needs.

Overall, we would highly recommend  Dr. Sumanto Bagchi to anyone in need of dental care.  Dr. Sumanto Bagchi is an excellent practitioner who truly cares about their patients and provides top-quality care.

review: I took my friend to Dr. Bagchi to discuss about her dental problems (I had been consulting him for all my dental problems since last 5 years). She had so many questions in her mind when she came along, but she was all relieved from the doubts after she consulted him. Other dentists whom she consulted in the past did not give her enough details to pursue appropriate resolution, but thanks to Dr. Bagchi for his thorough explanation of things. He's very polite, friendly, detailed, and honest while explaining and suggesting treatment and alternatives. I believe that "trust" is the essence of everything, and whenever someone asks me for a trustworthy and effective dentist, I fall back on Dr. Bagchi.

reply_text:
Dear Mrs. Uma Bhalla,

Thank you so much for your heartfelt review! I truly appreciate your kind words and am delighted to hear about your positive experiences at our clinic. Providing courteous and caring service, along with maintaining a hygienic environment, are fundamental aspects of our commitment to patient care.

Your trust in me and the team at our clinic means a lot, and we are honored to be recognized as the best place for dental treatment in your eyes. If you ever have any questions or need further dental care, please feel free to reach out.

Wishing you continued dental health and happiness, and looking forward to serving you in the future.

Best Regards,
Dr. Sumanto Bagchi

reply_text: Thank you for your feedback Sir. With due respect I would like to mention that I charged five hundred rupees for fixing a cap( that I haven’t originally placed in first place else I would have done it for free) by cleaning your tooth first and adjusting the cap post fixing, all of which took me 20min. I also initiated a mutual friendly conversation with you regarding your health children and Mam since you were an old patient of mine, Even though you barged in my chamber initially when a patient was already present. All of this just because I knew you for years and have performed multiple treatments on you. But since my fees bothers you now, I will make sure to mention my charges( which has changed after 2 years since your last visit) before providing you treatment. Best Regards

reply_text:
Dear Sir/Mam,

Thank you for your kind words! I'm thrilled to hear about your positive experience during your second visit. I'm glad you found the use of advanced equipment and the minimal prescription approach beneficial. Your satisfaction is truly rewarding. Looking forward to ensuring your continued well-being in future visits! Best regards, Dr. Sumanto Bagchi.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am visiting the doctor for last couple of years. He is the dentist for my whole family. Explains the problem and treatment course very well . Charges are very reasonable and most cost effective solution is suggested. Extremely satisfied and highly recommend

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited Dr Bagchi twice and found him very helpful,  expert hands and very soft spoken personfully satisfied with his treatment thanks
reply_text:
Dear Sir/mam,

Thank you so much for taking the time to share your positive experiences with our dental care. I'm thrilled to hear that you found our treatments helpful and that you were satisfied with the results. Your kind words about my expertise and approach mean a lot to me.

Ensuring a comfortable and effective dental experience is always my priority, and I'm pleased to know that you felt well taken care of during your visits.

If you ever have further dental needs or questions, please don't hesitate to reach out. It's been a pleasure serving you, and I look forward to continuing to provide excellent care.

Best Regards,
Dr. Sumanto Bagchi
